name: java-numbers
short_description: Java-Numbers is a library for working with complex numbers of arbitrary precision in Java. Currently I have implemented Rational, which describes rational numbers in vulgar form. For example instead of 1/3 becoming the irrational 0.3333..., it remains 1/3, and so operations on it result in what was intend, i.e. (1/3) * (3) = 1, and not 0.3333... * 3.0 = 0.9999...
summary: A library for working with various complex numbers in Java.
